description: The Shapefile format stores non-topological geometry and attribute information for the spatial features in a data set. The geometry for a feature is stored as a shape comprising a set of vector coordinates. Shapefiles can support point, line, and area features.
name: ESRI Shapefile

relations.title: Sustainability of Digital Formats: Planning for Library of Congress Collections

extras: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><metadata><field name="formatCategory">dataset</field><field name="filenameExtension">shp, shx, dbf, sbn, sbx, atx, fbn, fbx, ain, aih, ixs, mxs, prj, xml, cpg</field><field name="internetMediaType"></field><field name="pronomPUID"></field></metadata>
